All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbsListener
AbsListener class defines an interface used to communicate to View from Model.
Action
Action class is the type of message used for sending actions made from the client to the server.
ActionType
Class ActionType contains all the possible user action types to identify a client message.
ActivateCard
ActivateCard class represent the character card activation game action.
Answer
Answer class defines an interface for server answers.
AssistantCard
AssistantCard class represent the game's assistant cards, that determine the playing order of the game.
Bag
Bag class represents the game's random student extraction.
BagTest
Method BagTest tests the Bag class.
BalanceListener
BalanceListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after a player's balance change.
BalanceMessage
BalanceMessage class is type of ModelMessage used for sending updates of the player's balance.
BaseIsland
BaseIsland class represent the normal game island.
BaseRules
BaseRules class represent the normal version of the game's DynamicRules, that may get modified by CharacterCards.
BoardController
BoardController class represents the Board scene logic.
Card
 
Centaur
Centaur class is model representation of the Centaur character card.
CentaurRules
CentaurRules class extends the BaseRules class, overriding the rules that have changed since the activation of the Centaur character card.
Character
Class Character contains all the possible character cards to identify then on the user's client.
CharacterCard
CharacterCard class represents the basic abstract of a character card.
CharactersListener
CharactersListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after a change in character cards.
CharactersMessage
CharactersMessage class is type of ModelMessage used for sending updates of game's character cards.
ChooseCloud
ActivateCard class represent the cloud select game action.
ChooseMagician
ChooseMagician class represent the game action for selecting a magician before starting the game.
CLI
CLI is the main class for everything regarding the CLI client.
CLIColors
Class CLIColors contains all the Unicode color codes for everything regarding CLI printing.
Cloud
Cloud class represent the clouds to be selected at the end of the turn to refill the player's school.
CloudsListener
CloudsListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after a clouds update.
CloudsMessage
CloudsMessage class is type of ModelMessage used for sending updates of game's clouds.
Color
Class Color represents the game's student colors.
ConnectionMessage
Class ConnectionMessage is a type of Answer used for player connection updates.
ConnectionSocket
ConnectionSocket class handles the connection between the client and the server.
Constants
Class Constants represents all the game's game constraints, and it also contains the network address and port.
CustomMessage
Class CustomMessage is a type of Answer used for sending generic messages.
DeactivateCard
DeactivateCard class represent the character card manual deactivation game action.
Disconnect
Disconnect class is a type of Message sent by the Client when it's closed.
DuplicateNicknameException
Class DuplicateNicknameException is thrown when a player tries to register to a new or existing game lobby with an already used nickname.
DynamicRules
DynamicRules class is an interface to be implemented for each of the rule type.
Eriantys
Eriantys class is main launcher for the project.
ErrorType
Class GameState represents all the possibile errors sent by the server.
EventsToActions
EventsToActions class translates JavaFx events into well formatted commands to be passed to the InputToMessage class.
Farmer
Farmer class is model representation of the Farmer character card.
FarmerRules
FarmerRules class extends the BaseRules class, overriding the rules that have changed since the activation of the Farmer character card.
Game
The Game class contains the main Model (MVC) logic of "Eriantys".
GameError
Class GameError is a type of Answer used for sending different types of errors.
GameException
Class GameException is thrown when a generic error is given by the execution of an error.
GameHandler
GameHandler class handles a single match, instantiating a Game and a main GameManager.
GameManager
GameManager represent the main Controller class of the Game.
GameState
Class GameState represents all the possibile internal game states.
GameStateListener
GameStateListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after game state change.
GameStateMessage
GameStateMessage class is type of ModelMessage used for sending updates of game's state.
Grandma
Grandma class is model representation of the Grandma character card.
GrandmaBlockIsland
GrandmaBlockIsland class represent the Grandma character card game action.
GUI
GUI is the main class for everything regarding the GUI client.
GUIController
GUIController class defines an abstract representing all the different GUI controllers.
HandListener
HandListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after a player's hand update.
HandMessage
HandMessage class is type of ModelMessage used for sending updates of player's hand.
Herald
Herald class is model representation of the Herald character card.
HeraldChooseIsland
HeraldChooseIsland class represent the Herald character card game action.
InputToMessage
InputToMessage class parses the Client's commands.
InvalidIndexException
Class GameException is thrown when a wrong index is given to an action, and then it is executed.
InvalidNicknameException
 
InvalidPlayerException
Class GameException is thrown when an invalid player is given to an action.
Island
Island class is an abstract specification to be extended either with a BaseIsland or a SuperIsland.
IslandContainer
IslandContainer class is the container of the game board, represented by the starting 12 islands.
IslandsListener
MoveMotherListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after an island update.
IslandsMessage
IslandsMessage class is type of ModelMessage used for sending updates of the game's islands.
Joker
Joker class is model representation of the Joker character card.
JokerSwapStudents
JokerSwapStudents class represent the Joker character card game action.
Knight
Knight class is model representation of the Knight character card.
KnightRules
KnightRules class extends the BaseRules class, overriding the rules that have changed since the activation of the Knight character card.
LoaderController
LoaderController class represents the Loading scene logic.
LoginController
LoginController class represents the Login scene logic.
LoginMessage
LoginMessage class is a type of Message sent by the Client when it joins a game lobby.
Magician
Class Magician represents all the Magicians present in the game.
MagicianListener
MagicianListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after a magician selection.
MagicianMessage
MagicianMessage class is type of ModelMessage used for sending updates of the game's magicians.
MagiciansController
MagiciansController class represents the Magician selection scene logic.
MenuController
MenuController represents the Main Menu scene logic.
Message
Message class defines an interface representing a message sent by the client to the server.
MessageBuilder
MessageBuilder class creates the Message or Action selected by the Client.
Minstrel
Minstrel class is model representation of the Minstrel character card.
MinstrelSwapStudents
MinstrelSwapStudents class represent the Minstrel character card game action.
MinstrelTest
Method MinstrelTest tests the Minstrel class.
ModeListener
ModeListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after the game mode selection.
ModelMessage
ModelMessage class defines an interface for game model updates.
ModelView
ModelView class represents the client's data for the View implementation.
ModeMessage
ModeMessage class is type of ModelMessage used for sending the game's current mode.
Monk
Monk class is model representation of the Monk character card.
MonkMoveToIsland
MonkMoveToIsland class represent the Monk character card game action.
MotherMessage
MotherMessage class is type of ModelMessage used for sending updates of motherNature's current position.
MotherNature
MotherNature class represents the game Mother Nature, determined by its position.
MoveMotherListener
MoveMotherListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after the change of MotherNature's position.
MoveMotherNature
MoveMotherNature represents the action where Mother Nature is set to a new island, and this causes the calculation of the new island influence for each player.
MoveStudentFromEntry
MoveStudentFromEntry class is an abstract to be extended by the two types of movement possibile in the game.
MoveStudentFromEntryToHall
MoveStudentFromEntryToHall represents the action where a student is moved from the student entry to the hall.
MoveStudentFromEntryToIsland
MoveStudentFromEntryToIsland represents the action where a student is moved from the student entry to an island.
Mushroom
Mushroom class is model representation of the Mushroom character card.
MushroomChooseColor
MushroomChooseColor class represent the Mushroom character card game action.
MushroomRules
MushroomRules class extends the BaseRules class, overriding the rules that have changed since the activation of the Mushroom character card.
OutOfBoundException
 
Performable
Performable class is an abstract shared between every action possible in the game.
PingMessage
Class PingMessage is a type of Action used for sending a ping to a client.
PlayCard
PlayCard class represent the AssistantCard play move in the game, executed in the planning phase of the game.
PlayedCardListener
PlayedCardListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after a PlayCard action.
PlayedCardMessage
PlayedCardMessage class is type of ModelMessage used for sending updates of the current cards that have been played.
Player
Player class represents the user and player of the board game.
PlayersStatusListener
PlayersStatusListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after an update of the player list (disconnection or reconnection).
PlayersStatusMessage
PlayersStatusMessage class is a ModelMessage used for sending updates of the players' connection status.
PongMessage
Class PongMessage is a type of Action used for sending a pong response to a client.
Postman
Postman class is model representation of the Postman character card.
PostmanRules
PostmanRules class extends the BaseRules class, overriding the rules that have changed since the activation of the Postman character card.
Princess
Princess class is model representation of the Princess character card.
PrincessMoveToHall
PrincessMoveToEntry class represent the Princess character card game action.
PrincessMoveToHallTest
Class PrincessMoveToHallTest tests the PrincessMoveToHall action.
Printable
Class Printable represents the methods used by the CLI interface to graphically print the game board on the computer terminal.
ProfsListener
ProfsListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after change in professor ownership.
ProfsMessage
ProfsMessage class is a ModelMessage used for sending updates of the game's professors.
ReducedCharacterCard
ReducedCharacterCard class is a generic representation of the CharacterCard abstract to be sent to client, removing unnecessary information.
ReqMagicianMessage
Class ReqMagicianMessage is a that ca request be serialized.
ReqPlayersMessage
Class ReqPlayersMessage is a type of Answer used for requesting the lobby creation data to the first client who connects.
RoundManager
Method RoundManager is the Controller class that handles game states and turn logic.
RoundOwnerException
Class RoundOwnerException is thrown when the player associated with the action is not the current round owner.
RoundOwnerListener
RoundOwnerListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after a round owner change.
RoundOwnerMessage
RoundOwnerMessage class is a ModelMessage used for sending updates of the current round owner.
Rules
Rules class represents the game's rules, that get dynamically updated by the character cards.
School
School class represents the game's school boards, which contain the students' hall and entry and the player's towers.
SchoolListener
SchoolListener class is a AbsListener used for notifying the client after a player's school update.
SchoolMessage
SchoolMessage class is a ModelMessage used for sending updates of the players' School.
SerializedAnswer
Class SerializedAnswer is an Answer that can be serialized.
SerializedMessage
SerializedMessage class represents the serialized version of Actions or Messages.
Server
Server class is the main one of the server side, it allows clients to connect, play together and also starts the match.
ServerMessageHandler
ServerMessageHandler class handles the answers from the server notifying the correct part of the GUI or CLI through property change listeners.
SetupController
SetupController class represents the Setup scene logic.
SetupMessage
SetupMessage class represents the lobby creation type of Message.
SocketClientConnection
SocketClientConnection handles a connection between client and server, permitting sending and receiving messages and doing other class-useful operations too.
SocketListener
Method SocketListeners listens for a server answer on the socket, passing it to the client model class.
SocketServer
SocketServer class creates a socket that accepts connections from clients, and creates a thread containing them.
SuperIsland
SuperIsland class is the representation of multiple island that have been merged, as required by the game's rules.
Thief
Thief class is model representation of the Thief character card.
ThiefChooseColor
ThiefChooseColor class represent the Thief character card game action.
TowerColor
Class TowerColor contains all the possible tower colors.
UI
UI class defines an interface for both CLI and GUI.
VirtualClient
Virtual client interface; this is a representation of the virtual instance of the client, which is connected through server socket.
WinController
WinController class checks if a player has won.
WinMessage
Class WinMessage is a type of Answer used for sending the game winner to all the players.
WinnerController
WinnerController class represents the Game end scene logic.
WrongStateException
Class WrongStateException is thrown when an action is executed with the wrong game state set.
